#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cassert>
#include<bitset>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<cmath>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include <functional>
#include <bitset>

using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
        int t,n,foo,temp,lol;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
         lol=0;
         cin>>n;
         foo=n;
         while(n>0)
         { 
             temp=n%10;
             lol+=temp;
             n/=10;
         }
        cout<<foo%lol<<endl;
       }
 return 0;
}
